sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-content>
      <v-container class="fill-height">
        <v-row align="center" justify="center">
          <v-col cols="7" sm="4" md="4">
            <v-card class="elevation-12">
              <v-window v-model="step">
                <v-row>
                  <v-card-text class="pt-12 pl-10 pr-16 pb-10">
                    <v-img
                      max-height="80"
                      max-width="70"
                      src="../assets/icon.png"
                    ></v-img>

                    <v-form>
                      <v-text-field
                        label="Username"
                        name="Email"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-account"
                        type="text"
                        color="deep-purple darken-3"
                      />

                      <v-text-field
                        id="password"
                        label="Password"
                        name="password"
                        prepend-icon="key"
                        type="password"
                        color="deep-purple darken-3"
                      />
                    </v-form>

                    <v-btn rounded color="deep-purple darken-3 mt-16" dark
                      >SIGN IN</v-btn
                    >
                  </v-card-text>
                </v-row>
              </v-window>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-content>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    step: 1,
  }),
  props: {
    source: String,
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.v-content {
  background: rgb(63, 154, 251);
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle,
    rgba(63, 154, 251, 1) 0%,
    rgba(140, 91, 251, 1) 45%,
    rgba(126, 70, 252, 1) 100%
  );
}

.v-card {
  background: transparent;
}
</style>
